name: TrainLoop
description:
Trains are anxious vehicles, they prefer to stay in their own loop. Help them to stay on their tracks.

Controls:
-Click on the track signals to adjust the turnouts. You can set fixed tracks or automatic switching.
-Click on the stop signals to stop trians and let them go on again.
-Stay on the right track long enough to finish the level.
-Do not let trains crash.

Created by Jannik Staub and Malte Hentschel

Don't hesitate to suggest improvements - that's how one learns!
